choices.name: eight
choices.choiceText: 8x Tréning => 80 X-Tokenov

choices.name: four
choices.choiceText: 4x Tréning => 40 X-Tokenov

choices.name: six
choices.choiceText: 6x Tréning => 60 X-Tokenov

value.stringValue: select id, name, Price_per_Credit__c, Price_per_Package__c, Single_Package__c, Range_Discount__c from Credit_Price_Range__c order by name ASC

formulas.name: soqlPackagesFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!packageType.value}, "select id, name, Price_per_Credit__c, Price_per_ARX_Training__c,Quantity__c,Price_per_Package__c, Single_Package__c, Range_Discount__c from Credit_Price_Range__c where Single_Package__c = true AND RecordtypeId = '" + {!Get_Credit_Programs_Recordtype.Id} + "' order by Order__c ASC", "select id, name, Price_per_Credit__c,Quantity__c,Price_per_ARX_Training__c, Price_per_Package__c, Single_Package__c, Range_Discount__c from Credit_Price_Range__c where Single_Package__c = false AND RecordtypeId = '" + {!Get_Credit_Programs_Recordtype.Id} + "'order by Order__c ASC")

formulas.name: soqlSubscription
formulas.expression: "select id, name, Price_per_Credit__c, Price_per_ARX_Training__c,Quantity__c,Price_per_Package__c, Single_Package__c,Terms__c, Count_of_Trainings__c,Range_Discount__c from Credit_Price_Range__c WHERE Count_of_Trainings__c = " + TExt({!valueChosen}) + " AND RecordtypeId = '" + {!Get_Monthly_Subscription_Recordtype.Id} + "' order by Terms__c ASC"

value.stringValue: align-items: center; display: flex; justify-content: center; margin-bottom: 15px
align-items: center; display: flex; justify-content: center; margin-bottom: 15px

fields.name: cancelDisplay
fields.fieldText: Naozaj si želáte zrušiť platbu?

fields.name: paymentInfo
fields.fieldText:
{!sectionBox}

Zákazník ma na výber platbu kartou, Scan QR kod alebo hotovosťou

fields.name: info
fields.fieldText:
• Scan QR Code - Zákaznik oscanuje QR Code a urobí platbu
  • Platba Kartou použitím terminalu - Otvor si Revolut a nastav platbu. Daj zákaznikovi zaplatit priložením alebo vložením karty
  • Platba Hotovosťou - vyplať zákazníka

Po zaplatení klikno na "Platba Sprocesovaná"

fields.name: ddd
fields.fieldText: {!amountToPay} EUR

textTemplates.name: termsConditionsText
textTemplates.text: Súhlasím s obchodnými podmienkami

value.stringValue: select id, name, Price_per_Credit__c, Price_per_Package__c, Single_Package__c, Range_Discount__c from Credit_Price_Range__c where Single_Package__c = {!packageType.value} order by name ASC
